title: Pet spa & grooming station, Air conditioning & heating
posting_body: ['A FRESH OUTLOOK ON URBAN LIVING', 'Introducing TriVista on Speer, offering luxury studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartments anchored in downtown Denver’s coolest corner: The Golden Triangle Creative District.', 'Walk to the city’s best artistic, historical, and outdoor attractions.', 'Enjoy unparalleled amenities.', 'Take in the breathtaking mountain views.', 'TriVista truly satisfies your need for beauty, adventure, and escape.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 20', 'OR Text', '20', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to chat!', 'Want more information on this unit?', 'See link (below):', '<URL>', 'This is a 1 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 857 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Wood-style flooring', '- Designer backsplash', '- Studio ,1-bedroom, 2-bedroom & 3-bedroom units available', '- Tandem & private garage boxes', '- Electronic lock system', '- Electric or gas ranges', '- 2-level parking garage', '- Boutique-style interiors', '- In-home washer & dryer', '-
